children: Algorithm for the evaluation of pulmonary hypertension. CTEPH = chronic thromboembolic pulmonary hypertension; PA = pulmonary artery; PE = pulmonary embolism; PH = pulmonary hypertension; V/Q = ventilation/perfusion.

footnotes: Adapted from Frost A, Badesch D, Gibbs JSR, et al. Diagnosis of pulmonary hypertension. Eur Respir J. 2019;53.
